hero-title: Find the Perfect Plan for Your Needs and Start Achieving More Today!
hero-body: PropertyCareApp provides comprehensive solutions for teams managing Maintenance or Sales & Rentals, offering tools and insights to help you operate more efficiently and effectively.
base-plan-maintenance-summary: Say goodbye to paper-based resident and owner profiles! Easily book amenities through the app with just a few taps.
cancel-or-reschedule-events-directly-fro: Cancel or reschedule events directly from Google Calendar
send-notifications-and-announcements-by-: Send notifications and announcements by email or SMS (individually or in bulk)
create-comprehensive-profiles-for-all-re: Create comprehensive profiles for all residents and owners
define-access-levels-for-admin-panel-use: Define access levels for admin panel users
silver-plan-maintenance-summary: In addition to amenity booking, efficiently manage the maintenance of your property!
gold-plan-maintenance-summary: In addition to the features of the Basic and Silver plans, AI-Powered  workflows and streamline inventory to increase efficiency and reduce costs.
custom-plan-maintenance-summary: Tailor the system to your unique needs! Get a fully customized solution with advanced features, integrations, and workflows designed specifically for your property.
base-plan-sales-summary: Professional CRM with AI-Powered Assistant for better reminders and follow-up on sales activities
define-building-units-along-with-feature: Define Building Units along with features and pricing
ability-to-book-a-unit-for-a-specific-cu: Ability to Book a Unit for a Specific Customer
activate-units-for-sale-or-rent: Activate Units for Sale or Rent
submit-negotiations-and-easily-follow-up: Submit Negotiations and easily follow up
cancel-or-reschedule-directly-from-googl: Cancel or Reschedule Directly from Google Calendar
send-notifications-emails-and-sms-indivi: Send Notifications, Emails, and SMS (Individually or in Bulk)
silver-plan-sales-summary: In addition to the features of the Basic plan, you can present your units exceptionally through a professional website and engage directly with buyers.
interactive-presentation-for-tower-floor: Interactive Presentation for Tower, Floor and Unit Selection
displaying-units-in-gride-model-views: Displaying Units in Gride Model Views
an-alert-in-case-of-agents-failure-to-fo: An alert in case of agent's failure to follow up
gold-plan-sales-summary: In addition to the features of the Basic and Silver plan, you get a professional scheduling system, the ability to define access roles, AI-powered assistance, and unit visit handling.
ai-with-memory-of-past-conversations: AI with memory of past conversations
weighted-search-and-filtering-for-units: Weighted search and filtering for units
custom-plan-sales-summary: Tailor the system to your unique needs! Get a fully customized solution with advanced features, integrations, and workflows designed specifically for your property.
form-maker-module-to-create-various-form: Form maker module to create various forms (e.g., collaboration, inquiry, etc.)
add-an-alert-in-case-of-delay-in-the-cal: Add an alert in case of delay in the call

enable-sms-and-email-payment-reminders-f: Enable SMS and Email payment reminders for each scheduled payment according to the contract
comments-recent-activities: Comments and recent activities on edit forms on portal
interactive-presentation: Interactive Presentation for Tower, Floor and Unit Selection
grid-model-views: Displaying Units in Grid Model Views
activate-unit: Activate a unit for Sale or Rent
price-info-toggle: Active or Deactivate price information for units
reservation-receipt: Reservation receipt with complete information and expiration date for customer
unit-request: Submit a unit selling or renting request
media-display: Displaying a Photo/Video/360-degree view album on the details page of each unit
price-update-excel: Increase and decrease unit prices through an Excel file
commission-view: View the commission amount of units currently under negotiation with ACL access
search-filtering: Weighted search and filtering for units
ai-memory: AI with memory of past conversations
form-maker-module: Form maker module to create various forms (e.g., collaboration, inquiry, etc.)
automatic-registration: Automatic registration of each visit or call request
assigning-applicant-to-agent: Assigning each applicant to an agent
automatic-submission-inquiry: Automatic Submission of Each Price Inquiry or Catalog Request

estimated-success-percentage: Determine an estimated success percentage by the negotiator

have-any-project-lets-&-grow-your-busine: Have Any Project? Let’s & Grow Your Business
